trans-unit.resname: G99·1 | Memory Lapse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
